tasks.title: Mac Mini Headless Setup

tasks.title: Baseball Tournament Research
tasks.description: 11U tournaments within 2hrs of Newtown PA. 80+ tournaments found, March indoor options identified.

tasks.description: Phone calls with Claudia via Twilio. Working with ngrok static domain. Number: +1 610-890-5758.

tasks.description: Telegram bot for family (@PiccarretaFamilyBot). Sonnet model, restricted tools, memory system for kids.

tasks.title: AI Model Routing
tasks.description: Implemented Opus for conversations, Sonnet for sub-agents. Prompt caching enabled (1hr TTL). ~50% cost savings.

tasks.title: Weekly Planning Agent
tasks.description: Sunday 7 PM interactive planning session. 6-step flow: close-out, open items, priorities, reminders, time blocking, relationships.

tasks.title: Daily Briefing Agent
tasks.description: 5:45 AM briefing with sub-agents: Email Analyst, Industry Scanner, Competitor Monitor. 8 sections including fitness tracking.

tasks.description: iOS Shortcut to export HealthKit data: steps, workouts, calories burned, calories consumed, exercise minutes.

tasks.description: 20-year reserve study for private road. 9 homes, $167/month contribution, DKC snow contract. Gist published.

tasks.description: Fixed IP forwarding and route push on Raspberry Pi. Both IKEv2 and OpenVPN now working for remote access.

tasks.description: Form homeowners association for Jericho neighborhood. Bylaws, dues structure, legal formation process.

tasks.description: Domain expertise system for Pharma/MedTech Supply Chain. LanceDB + Ollama embeddings, local-first architecture. Awaiting Mike's answers to 27 planning questions.

tasks.description: Explore OpenAI Realtime API for natural voice conversations. Alternative to Twilio TTS approach.

tasks.title: Competitor Intelligence Repository
tasks.description: Track what competitor consulting firms publish in pharma/medtech/supply chain. 13 firms monitored across 4 topics. Private GitHub repo with firm + topic folder structure.

tasks.title: Professional Email Agent
tasks.description: Learning email assistant that drafts professional emails in Mike's style. Analyzes edits to improve over time. Style guide with tone options.

tasks.title: End of Day Debrief
tasks.description: 8 PM weekday check-in: review the day, surface loose ends, preview tomorrow, capture thoughts. Conversational Telegram delivery.

tasks.title: AI Agent Creation Framework
tasks.description: Build specialized sub-agents for common tasks. Tiered plan: Morning Brief, Research, Home Automation (Tier 1), then Writing and Family Coordinator (Tier 2).

tasks.title: 2026 Biopharma CEO Agenda
tasks.description: Thought leadership article defining 2026 CEO agenda for biopharma. DRAFT-v4 complete (4,500 words, plagiarism clean). 4 themes: Algorithm Wars, End of Strategic Stability, AI Transformation Question, GLP-1 Reckoning. 12 Kearney citations. Awaiting Mike's review of DRAFT-v4.

tasks.title: AI Management Studio
tasks.description: Web app to monitor and orchestrate OpenClaw agents. Next.js 15 + shadcn/ui + SQLite. Phase 1 complete: Dashboard, Agents, Sessions, Chat, Cron, Config, Analytics. Phase 2 in progress: Real Cost DB (7,888 records, $1,084 equivalent), Config Editor, Agent Designer.

tasks.title: Tool Optimization
tasks.description: Analyze and optimize OpenClaw tool usage patterns. Identify redundant calls, improve efficiency, reduce token consumption.
